data.text: Vinye, ne èxɔ nye nyawo
ne ètrɔ to ɖe nunya ŋu
ne èyɔ sidzedze
ne èdii abe klosalo
ekema àse Yehowavɔvɔ̃ gɔme
elabena Yehowae naa nunya,
Eɖo dziɖuɖu ɖi na nuteƒewɔlawo
elabena edzɔa ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe toƒewo ŋu
Ekema àse nu si nyo,
elabena nunya age ɖe wò dzi me,
Tamebubu nyui akpɔ tawò,
Nunya aɖe wò tso ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe mɔwo dzi,
ame siwo gblea mɔ dzɔdzɔetɔwo ɖi hezɔna
ame siwo nu gbegblẽ wɔwɔ doa dzidzɔ na,
ame siwo ƒe mɔwo glɔ̃
Nunya aɖe wò le nyɔnu ahasitɔ hã ƒe asi me
ame si gblẽ eƒe ɖetugbimesrɔ̃ ɖi
elabena eƒe aƒe ɖo ta ku me
Ame siwo katã yia egbɔ la megatrɔna gbɔna loo
Ale àto ame nyuiwo ƒe mɔwo dzi
Ame dzɔdzɔewo anɔ anyigba dzi
gake woatsrɔ̃ ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ɖa le anyigba dzi
